steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5d6hf","text":"(3) 2.0mm zirconium oxide beads and ~    volume  of 0.5mm glass beads are added to each sample tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"23ebp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"75","guid":"4D42DF901DF611EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fakeh","text":"Samples are placed in Tissuelyser II using adapter trays chilled at -80C and homogenized at 1800rpm for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f92qn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"58C24B301DF611EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7jm8l","text":" of 100% isopropanol is added to the 1.5mL Eppendorf tube containing the homogenized sample. The sample tube is lightly vortexed to create a suspension of homogenized sample and the resulting slurry is transferred to a new 2.0mL Eppendorf tube, leaving the beads behind in the original tube. This step is repeated so that a total of   of solvent is transferred to the new 2.0mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":333,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3up5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","guid":"9B483420485211EAAA880FA076ED2769","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","guid":"56ECC5904DD211EA8865D3D2EB2BCC6D","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnlno","text":"Samples are placed in the centrifuge and spun at max speed (22100G) for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"C2C3BEB01DF611EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"91c0m","text":"Supernatant of each sample is transferred to a new 2.0 mL Eppendorf labeled for RP chromatography and dried down using steps 14 through 18","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bdgrv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8na0p","text":"The second round of the sequential extraction is   of 80/20 methanol/water per added directly to the pellet remaining after centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"46ggn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","guid":"08A092501DF711EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5trq1","text":"Samples are shaken using the Fisher Scientific Isotemp High Speed Shaker at 1500rpm for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dnl8t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"C152EE504DD211EA8865D3D2EB2BCC6D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4f8br","text":"2.0mL Eppendorfs are placed in the centrifuge and spun at max speed (22100G) for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"58vms","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2DC034001DF711EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fogq2","text":"Supernatant of each sample is transferred to a new 2.0 mL Eppendorf labeled for HILIC chromatography and dried down using steps 14 through 18","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca8oh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7uibn","text":"Samples are placed in a Labconco CentriVap concentrator and monitored until they have completely dried (roughly 4-5 hours)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gcul","text":"Once dry, samples are stored at   until they are to be run on the LC-MS instrument.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kdeb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"741A4DF01DF711EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d8j4","text":"When preparing samples to run on LC-MS, reconstitute samples with   of 100% isopropanol for reverse phase and 80/20 methanol/water for HILIC.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fp8ob","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"75","guid":"879860D0485211EAAA880FA076ED2769","id":0,"label":"","unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47jlj","text":"After LC-MS analysis, samples can be stored at -80C until ready for IMS analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3v0km","text":"Samples are vortexed for   and then extracted over night  at -20C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4dt4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"0092CB604F5B11EAB5664788E01ACCD6","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bcbv","text":"Pellets are dried for 1 hour and stored at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"18dch","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"117C0E504DDF11EA8865D3D2EB2BCC6D","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ho9j","text":"Vortex for 1 minute, then centrifuge at max speed (22100G) for ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"2DC034001DF711EA872D6B1000E775E1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
